title: Argentinian Lentil Stew
ingredients: ['190g dry lentils', '1 litre water', '1 cube vegetable stock', '3 medium tomatoes, peeled and diced', '1 large onion, diced', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 medium apple, peeled, cored and diced', '75g frozen peas', '1 large clove garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 tablespoons barbecue sauce', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste']
